mapper.select: SELECT CAST(SUM(IF(vehicle_out=1, 1, 0)) AS SIGNED) AS isout, CAST(SUM(IF(vehicle_out=0, 1, 0)) AS SIGNED) AS isin, CASE WHEN #{duration} = 'day' THEN DATE_FORMAT(cross_time, '%Y-%m-%d') WHEN #{duration} = 'month' THEN DATE_FORMAT(cross_time, '%Y-%m') WHEN #{duration} = 'year' THEN DATE_FORMAT(cross_time, '%Y') END AS cross_time FROM t_vehicle_record WHERE cross_time <= CURDATE()+INTERVAL 1 DAY GROUP BY CASE WHEN #{duration} = 'day' THEN DATE_FORMAT(cross_time,'%Y-%m-%d') WHEN #{duration} = 'month' THEN DATE_FORMAT(cross_time,'%Y-%m') WHEN #{duration} = 'year' THEN DATE_FORMAT(cross_time,'%Y') END;
